Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the east side of the Shrine of Life and Death.
Room.LongDescription: The symbolic Shrine of Life and Death is the single most important shrine in Oceancrest for all clerics despite their individual diety of worship. All religion is based on the cycle of life and death, and the balance between the two. Understanding this fundamental cycle is the first step towards understanding one's own religion.
